about_the_game:
Enjoy the thrilling adventure of "Maze of Realities: Symphony of Invention DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This additional content includes four new locations! You'll get to visit Marshall's lab, as well as explore the cave, where you're sure to find something that can clear things up for you! There's also a lot of stuff waiting for you in the crystal processing room and the invention warehouse!

In the new locations, you will face additional challenges and save worlds from the brink of extinction. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🌌 VISIT THE MARSHALL'S LABORATORY!
A table with various records, crystals of different colors and shapes, a floor lamp, a panel... Here you can find a lot of entertaining things that will definitely help in your adventure.

🌌 TAKE A LOOK AROUND THE CAVE!
You enter the cave and see an altar, which also has some kind of sign on it. What are your actions? That's right - you have to look around thoroughly to find even the slightest clue!

🌌 EXPLORE THE CRYSTAL PROCESSING ROOM!
Ever wondered how nuggets are processed and stored? It's up to you to explore the crystal processing room! Just don't forget you're not there on a tour.

🌌 COME TO THE INVENTION WAREHOUSE!
It seems someone left a box of donuts on the table, but you can't eat the evidence! You'll have to be very attentive to find something really valuable among the mess and all sorts of little things.

Are you ready to find all the carefully hidden objects and solve all the puzzles? Start your journey and discover all the achievements!

short_description: The Maze of Realities awaits – are you ready to shape the destiny of multiple worlds? Go on a journey and figure it out!
